Translations.Text: Ih, Ieoa Mass ik, kecc akked urbaa seg wid illan yidek, teppekkrem deg iv, qoib sin imuren, ne$ azgen, ne$ amur wis kue. Oebbi Iwezzen iv akked wass; Ieoa ur ten teepbem ara. Issuref awen. E$oet, si Leqwoan, ayen isehlen fellawen. Ieoa ad ilin segwen imuvan. Wiyav ppinigen di tmurt, pnadin lfevl n Oebbi. Wiyav pna$en deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ihi, e$oet, segs, ayen isehlen fellawen; eallet; zekkit; oevlet aS i Oebbi, aoeiial umain. Lxio ara txedmem i iman nnwen, a t tafem ar Oebbi. D arraz it yifen, it i$elben. Ssutret ssmae i Oebbi.
